person_say: I've been having problems with my friends at school, and it's stressing me out.
animal_say: It sounds like you could use some help with all that stress! There's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and relaxation. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Here comes Bruno, ready to share his calming wisdom and mindfulness tips to help you find your peace.
